snippet.title: Coloree a relaxing color puzzle game for PC
snippet.description:
Coloree is a great, relaxing, puzzle game for PC. If you like colors and geometric shapes, plus have the patience to move them around, this is a game for you. It’s relaxing on one hand, while still being satisfying as levels are finished and skill at Coloree increased. Simple and powerful Coloree will keep you intrigued and coming back for more.
Get it on: www.coloreegame.com
